document_data.name: Blinding smite
document_data.mainbody: '''Blinding smite''' was an [[evocation]] [[spell]] that made the next hit with a [[melee weapon]] create a explosion of light and radiant damage against the target.
document_data.Effects: For the duration of the spell, a struck target could be blinded and would have to try and resist the magical brightness that struck their eyes. The spell also caused radiant damage to the target.
document_data.Components: Only a [[verbal component]] was required to cast this spell.
